content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 24, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft an orange_wool, I need to move the white_wool from slot 38 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 24, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft an orange_wool, I need to move the orange_dye from slot 43 to slot 2 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 24, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an orange_wool, I need to move the orange_wool from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
